attributes.action: Waive all visa restrictions for any Ukrainian nationals seeking UK safe haven
attributes.additional_details: This action is in the DNA of our country. It needs no justification. Its the right and proper thing to do.
attributes.background: We have seen the terrible tragedy unfold in the Ukraine, and those hundreds of thousands of citizens who have left everything behind while their country has been invaded by a tyrannical dictator. We must ensure that we support the civilian population and provide a safe place to live.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
